thread.title: Coco Uzuki's Fall in Love, You False Angels manga reportedly set to receive anime adaptation
thread.title_full: Coco Uzuki's Fall in Love, You False Angels manga reportedly set to receive anime adaptation

author: Apratim Chakraborty
title: Coco Uzuki's Fall in Love, You False Angels manga reportedly set to receive anime adaptation
text:

Coco Uzuki's Fall in Love, You False Angels manga reportedly set to receive anime adaptation Discuss Now Coco Uzuki's Fall in Love, You False Angels manga reportedly set to receive anime adaptation (Image via Kodansha) Coco Uzuki's Fall in Love, You False Angels manga series is receiving an anime adaptation production , according to a tweet posted by a renowned animanga news leaker, @SugoiLite on X (formerly Twitter) on Thursday, December 26, 2024.
However, no pertinent information, such as the release date, cast & staff, studio, and other details are revealed as of this writing. Having said that, the leaker mentioned an official announcement regarding the anime adaptation would come soon. The leaker's previous records in providing accurate information ahead of their official release give the news credibility.
An anime adaptation of Coco Uzuki's Fall in Love, You False Angels manga is allegedly green-lit for production Expand Tweet Trending Prominent animanga news leaker, Sugoi LITE ( @SugoiLITE ) posted a tweet on Wednesday, December 25, 2024, at 11:57 pm IST, to reveal that Fall in Love, You False Angels anime, based on Coco Uzuki's eponymous shoujo manga , is in the works.
However, no details regarding the anime's studio, release date, or cast and staff were disclosed. Although the official staff hasn't shared any news regarding the manga's anime adaptation, the leaker said the announcement will be made in time.
Notably, this is not the first time the user has leaked anime-manga-related news ahead of their official announcement. On previous occasions, the leaker correctly predicted the news of the Ranma 1/2 remake, Lookism anime adaptation, Omniscient Reader's Viewpoint anime, and others.
Otogi and Toki, as seen in the volume 4 cover (Image via Kodansha) The user's track record in reporting anime-related news prior to their official announcements gives the Fall in Love, You False Angels anime adaptation's news credibility. Having said that, it's interesting how the series has been reportedly green-lit for adaptation with only four volumes published thus far.
Notably, Coco Uzuki's Fall in Love, You False Angels manga has been serialized in Kodansha 's Dessert magazine since April 2023. Since its debut in the magazine, the shojo manga has released four tankobon volumes.
Kodansha released the first volume on September 13, 2023, in Japan. Following that, the second volume was released on February 13, 2024, while the third volume came out on July 11, 2024. The latest volume was released on December 13, 2024. Kodansha USA has published two volumes of the manga in English.
